# Project Manager

---

A module for managing projects.

---

## project.init(json)

- `json`: (`object`) Project data

Initialize the manager from a JSON data.

```typescript
project.init({
    projects: {
        path: '/test/test-project',
        name: 'test',
        validity: true,
        type: '2d',
        ctime: new Date().getTime(),
        otime: -1,
    }
});
```

---

## project.dump()

Returns the current managed JSON data.

```typescript
project.dump();
```

---

## project.setOpenHandler(func)

- `func`: (`Function`) Open handler function

Set the open handler function.

```typescript
project.setOpenHandler(() => {
    console.log('test');
});
```

---

## project.add(path)

- `path`: (`string`) Project path

Add a directory to the project manager.

```typescript
project.add('/test/test-project');
```

---

## project.remove(path)

- `path`: (`string`) Project path

Remove a directory from the project manager.

```typescript
project.remove('/test/test-project');
```

---

## project.open(path)

- `path`: (`string`) Project path

Open a project.

```typescript
project.open('/test/test-project');
```

---

## project.query([option])

- `option`: (`object`) Project configuration

Query projects.

```typescript
const pros = project.query();
console.log(pros);
const pro = project.query({
    sort: 'otime',
    order: 'desc',
    name: 'project-name',
    type: '2d',
});
console.log(pro);
```

---
